required_patterns.4-tier-structure: Components organized in 4 top-level folders: ui/, admin/, client/, common/
required_patterns.ui-components: shadcn-svelte base primitives in /ui (buttons, inputs, dialogs)
required_patterns.admin-components: Admin panel components in /admin with layout/, features/, widgets/ subfolders
required_patterns.client-components: Customer-facing components in /client with layout/, features/, widgets/ subfolders
required_patterns.common-components: Shared components in /common with layout/, data-display/, forms/, feedback/, navigation/, utility/ subfolders
required_patterns.feature-grouping: Group components by domain in features/ (product-management/, blog-management/)
required_patterns.barrel-exports: Use index.ts for barrel exports in feature folders

architectural_constraints.decision-tree: Use decision tree: base UI primitive → /ui, admin-only → /admin, client-only → /client, shared → /common
architectural_constraints.no-mixing: Never mix admin and client logic in same component
architectural_constraints.extract-common: Duplicate code between admin/client must be extracted to /common
architectural_constraints.shadcn-first: Always check shadcn-svelte before creating custom UI components
architectural_constraints.naming: Files: kebab-case.svelte, Exports: PascalCase, Folders: kebab-case
architectural_constraints.remote-functions: All data operations use remote functions pattern
architectural_constraints.i18n: All user-facing text uses translation keys
architectural_constraints.no-business-in-ui: UI components must not contain business logic or API calls

required_patterns.component-structure: UI components must use shadcn-svelte pattern with module script for types and regular script for props
required_patterns.variant-system: Use tailwind-variants tv() for creating variant-based component APIs
required_patterns.class-merging: Always use cn() utility for merging Tailwind classes
required_patterns.svelte-5-runes: Must use $props, $bindable, @render syntax - no legacy export let
required_patterns.typescript: All components must be TypeScript with proper type exports

architectural_constraints.styling: Only Tailwind v4 utility classes allowed, no inline styles or component-scoped CSS
architectural_constraints.props-pattern: Props must be defined with $props() rune and include ref support via $bindable
architectural_constraints.children-rendering: Children must be rendered with {@render children?.()} syntax
architectural_constraints.type-exports: Export component Props, Variants, and Size types from index.ts barrel files
architectural_constraints.polymorphic-components: Components can accept both href (renders <a>) or render as <button>

required_patterns.server-loads: +page.server.ts for server-side data loading with PageServerLoad type
required_patterns.form-actions: Form submissions via SvelteKit actions exported from +page.server.ts

architectural_constraints.i18n-routing: Must use i18n.reroute() in hooks.ts for internationalized routes
architectural_constraints.auth-protection: Protected routes check event.locals.user and redirect if null
architectural_constraints.load-return-types: Server load functions must type with PageServerLoad
architectural_constraints.actions-type: Form actions must type with Actions from ./$types
architectural_constraints.redirects: Use redirect(302, path) from @sveltejs/kit for navigation
architectural_constraints.failures: Use fail(statusCode, data) for form validation errors

required_patterns.server-state: Use event.locals for request-scoped state (user, session)
required_patterns.svelte-runes: Use $state rune for reactive client state (Svelte 5)
required_patterns.no-global-store: No centralized state management library (no Redux/Zustand)
required_patterns.load-functions: Data fetching via load functions, not client-side stores

architectural_constraints.locals-typing: event.locals typed in app.d.ts with user and session
architectural_constraints.server-first: Server-side data fetching preferred over client-side
architectural_constraints.remote-functions: Use query() and form() patterns for server communication
architectural_constraints.reactive-state: Client reactivity via Svelte 5 runes, not stores

required_patterns.orm: Drizzle ORM for all database operations
required_patterns.schema-definition: Define schemas in src/lib/server/db/schema.ts using drizzle-orm/sqlite-core
required_patterns.db-instance: Single db instance exported from src/lib/server/db/index.ts
required_patterns.migrations: Use drizzle-kit for schema migrations (db:push, db:migrate)
required_patterns.remote-functions: Wrap database operations in query() or form() remote functions

architectural_constraints.server-only: Database code must stay in $lib/server/* (never client-side)
architectural_constraints.sqlite-dialect: Must use SQLite dialect and patterns
architectural_constraints.primary-keys: Use text() for primary keys with UUIDs or base32 encoded strings
architectural_constraints.timestamps: Use integer() with { mode: 'timestamp' } for dates
architectural_constraints.query-building: Use Drizzle query builder (select, insert, update, delete) with type safety
architectural_constraints.env-variables: DATABASE_URL must be provided via environment

required_patterns.password-hashing: Argon2 for password hashing with specific parameters
required_patterns.session-tokens: SHA-256 hashed tokens stored as cookies
required_patterns.token-generation: Base32-encoded random bytes for session tokens
required_patterns.user-ids: Base32-encoded random bytes for user IDs (120 bits entropy)
required_patterns.hooks: Authentication handled in hooks.server.ts before all requests

architectural_constraints.token-encoding: Use @oslojs/encoding for base32 and hex encoding
architectural_constraints.locals-injection: Set event.locals.user and event.locals.session in handle hook
architectural_constraints.session-table: Store sessions in database with id, userId, expiresAt columns

required_patterns.form-validation: Use with form() remote function for automatic validation
required_patterns.query-validation: Use with query() remote function for input validation

architectural_constraints.validation-chains: Chain validators with v.pipe() for multiple checks
architectural_constraints.server-side: Validation must happen server-side, not client-only

required_patterns.compile-time: Translations compiled at build time (zero runtime overhead)
required_patterns.reroute: Use i18n.reroute() in hooks.ts for route localization

architectural_constraints.no-runtime-loading: No dynamic translation loading - all compile-time
architectural_constraints.handle-sequence: i18n handle must run before auth handle in sequence()

architectural_constraints.test-command: Use pnpm test or pnpm test:e2e to run tests

required_patterns.build-tool: Vite 5 as build tool and dev server
required_patterns.i18n-plugin: paraglide Vite plugin for i18n generation

architectural_constraints.plugin-order: tailwindcss() must come before sveltekit() in Vite plugins
architectural_constraints.experimental-features: remoteFunctions: true and async: true enabled
